title: Fraudulent representation of origin of goods
context: ยง481-23 Fraudulent representation of origin of goods. No person shall sell or offer for sale at retail any goods incorrectly purporting to be manufactured by or for or sold by the government of the United States. [L 1945, c 214, ยง3; RL 1955, ยง205-42; HRS ยง481-23]
